sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container class="justify-center d-flex mx-auto flex-column">
    <v-btn @click="toggleDrawer" class="align-self-center">
      HHHHH
    </v-btn>
    <transition
        appear
        name="slide-fade"
        v-on:before-enter="beforeEnter"
        v-on:enter="enter"
        v-on:leave="leave"
        css>
      <v-card v-if="drawer" class="elevation-24 rounded-xl d-flex justify-center align-self-center"  style="width: 75vw;" color="greeting-background">
        <v-carousel
            continuous
            cycle
            interval="5000"
            hide-delimiter-background
            delimiter-icon="mdi-guitar-pick"
            show-arrows-on-hover
            height="58vh"
            class="rounded-xl ma-1"
        >
          <v-carousel-item
              class="rounded-xl"
              v-for="(slide, i) in slides"
              :key="i"
              :src="slide"
          >
          </v-carousel-item>
        </v-carousel>
      </v-card>
    </transition>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import velocityMixin from "@/mixins/velocityMixin.ts";
import Velocity from "velocity-animate";

export default {
  name: "TheIndexViewCarousel",
  data: () => ({
    drawer: true,
        slides: [
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_metallica.png"),
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_slipknot.png"),
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel_lamb_of_god.png"),
        require("../../../../../assets/images/index_carousel.png")
    ],
  }),
  methods: {
    toggleDrawer: () => this.drawer = !this.drawer,
    beforeEnter: function (element) {
      element.style.opacity = 0;
      element.style.transformOrigin = 'left';
    },
    enter: function (element, done) {
      Velocity(element, { opacity: 1},
          { duration: 750 });
      Velocity(element, { complete: done });
    },
    leave: function (element, done) {
      Velocity(element, { translateX: '15px', rotateZ: '50deg' },
          { duration: 300 })
      Velocity(element, { rotateZ: '100deg' },
          { loop: 1 });
      Velocity(element, {
            rotateZ: '45deg',
            translateY: '30px',
            translateX: '30px',
            opacity: 0
          },
          { complete: done });
    }
  },
}
</script>

<style scoped>

</style>
